name: Platty: The Single Platform Adventure
description:
Help Platty the Platform guide the character to the end of each level while avoiding evil stars and collecting friendly suns along the way.

Controls: 

  • Move Platty - Mouse
  • Select Buttons - Left Click
  • Pause - Escape or P

Collaborators: 

This game was made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam by:

ShockingShots - Twitter - YouTube

  • Programming
  • Game Design
  • Level Design

Starilune - Twitter - Instagram

  • Game Art
